Module com.snake.dms_courseworkhilman_hazizi

Package main

package main
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Controller
    The Controller class in the MVC pattern.
    This class is responsible for handling key presses and pausing the game.
    Model
    The Model class in the MVC pattern.
    This class is responsible for creating the snake and food, and determining whether the snake is still alive or not.
    Play
    The main class that starts the game.
    SceneController
    The controller that is used in the FXML files to switch scenes.
    View
    The View class in the MVC pattern.
    This class is responsible for everything that is shown on the window of the game such as drawing elements on the screen.
